|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi M |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 4 |revision = (2GB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.5 GHz<!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2.0 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BCMA; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1, PCIe (non-standard connector), eMMC module connector, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C)
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000,8,N,1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1, Micro SD Card slot, Audio out (3.5mm), eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0a, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, I2S, I2C, SPI, GPIO, RTC |addchip = Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, Super Speed USB 3.1 Gen1 Hub Controller;VIA Labs;VL817;;1;,,, <!-- I2S Audio Codec,-->1.3W Class AB/D Mono Speaker Amplifier;Realtek;ALC5651;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/ PD;On Semi;FUSB302;;1;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;Maxim Integrated;MAX809R;;1;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8010;;2;,,, 100mΩ, 2A Slew Rate Controlled Load Switch;Richtek;RT9724;;2;,,, 500mA Low Voltage, LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9041;;1;,,, 300mA High Speed LDO Regulator;Torex;XC6219;;2;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;5;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;12; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2018 |estprice = 65 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6354 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|NanoPi series|Rockchip|AMPAK|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz :+ Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3-1866) or 4GB (LPDDR3-1866) Dual-channel SDRAM *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, eMMC module socket *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK]] [https://github.com/rockchip-linux/rkwifibt/tree/master/firmware/broadcom/AP6354/wifi AP6354] ([[Broadcom]] BCM4354A1) • [http://www.boardcon.com/download/AP6354_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_M4 ''NanoPi M4'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/nanopi-neo4-sbc-breaks-rk3399-records-for-size-and-price/ ''NanoPi Neo4 SBC breaks RK3399 records for size and price'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/08/24/nanopi-m4-raspberry-pi-rk3399-board/ ''NanoPi M4 Raspberry Pi Inspired RK3399 Board Launched'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/05/23/rockchip-rk3399-sbc-nanopc-t4/ ''FriendlyELEC Launches Rockchip RK3399 SBC NanoPC-T4'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
